title: Sleeping with the Fishes
description: Fredericka Bimm is a mermaid. But she's not the stuff of legends. A marine biologist, she knows what's in the water so chooses not to expose herself to toxins. Then two strangers come into her life. Her new colleague is a hunk with a mermaid fixation. The other claims he is Artur - her rightful ruler!
author: MaryJanice Davidson
